'''''carnë''''' is a [[Quenya]] ajective which means "red" or "scarlet".

==Etymology==
Derived from the [[Sundocarme|root]] AK- ("narrow, confined").<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry '''KARÁN-'''</ref>

==Examples==
*[[Carnistir]] = Red-face
*[[Orocarni]] = Red Mountains

{{References}}

* [http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf Quenya-English Wordlist] compiled by [[Helge Fauskanger]]
